parametrized_description: The company produces two types of workbooks: math and English. It must produce at least MinMathWorkbooks math workbooks and at least MinEnglishWorkbooks English workbooks, but no more than MaxMathWorkbooks math workbooks and no more than MaxEnglishWorkbooks English workbooks. Additionally, the total number of workbooks produced must be at least MinTotalWorkbooks. The objective is to maximize the total profit, which is calculated as ProfitMathWorkbook multiplied by the number of math workbooks plus ProfitEnglishWorkbook multiplied by the number of English workbooks.

MinMathWorkbooks.description: Minimum number of math workbooks to produce

MinEnglishWorkbooks.description: Minimum number of English workbooks to produce

MaxMathWorkbooks.description: Maximum number of math workbooks to produce

MaxEnglishWorkbooks.description: Maximum number of English workbooks to produce

MinTotalWorkbooks.description: Minimum total number of workbooks to produce

QuantityMathWorkbooks.description: The number of math workbooks produced

QuantityEnglishWorkbooks.description: The number of English workbooks produced

constraints.description: The number of math workbooks produced must be at least MinMathWorkbooks.
The number of English workbooks produced must be at least MinEnglishWorkbooks.
The number of math workbooks produced must not exceed MaxMathWorkbooks.
The number of English workbooks produced must not exceed MaxEnglishWorkbooks.
The total number of workbooks produced must be at least MinTotalWorkbooks.

objective.description: Total profit is calculated as ProfitMathWorkbook multiplied by the number of math workbooks plus ProfitEnglishWorkbook multiplied by the number of English workbooks. The objective is to maximize the total profit.
